system.description:
You stand beside and beyond nature. Whether you still tend it is your own choice to make. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Wisdom score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • When your warlock and druid levels total 13, you gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.bai4lew5iaw5pmfa]{Pactkeeper’s Reward} invocation for free, but you must choose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f2mfiz8spijbzs6h]{Pact of the Chain} if you do not already have it.
  • You gain additional benefits based on your pact boon(s):
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6co2rqjh9npjg3eb]{Pact of the Blade}, your pact weapon can harvest magical essence from your foes. When you score a critical hit with your pact weapon, you regain a spell point. You also learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.7mwrwjjj3mn4yzxr]{Altered Strike} cantrip.
    • If you chave Pact of the Chain, your familiar’s form becomes a bit … unusual. It can slip through spaces as narrow as an inch without squeezing and critical hits against it are treated as regular hits. You are also constantly under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.z5a26lxyh3esw2rl]{Speak with Animals} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.rek0fg987gg30wp9]{Speak with Plants}.
    • If you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2dp9b4a11fuxjwbc]{Pact of the Tome}, your Book of Shadows empowers you to move in unexpected ways. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.ijh0tu0wgpsp7v6n]{Misty Step} spell as your choice of a druid or warlock spell. Additionally, once per long rest, you may cast @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.8j1p6dsp3qfvjprc]{Tree Stride} without using a spell slot.
system.prerequisite: Warden of the Shadowed Grove feat
